page.title: 14THE BURROUGHS -ADMIN.CENTRE.
page.content: The Burroughs is the administrative centre of Barnet.Here is located the Town Hall,the Main Library,the Trading Standards Office,the Registration Office where births,marriages and deaths are recorded,and the Rates Office.Other important buildings are the Fire Station and the Middlesex Polytechnic. The most important building is the Town Hall.Here 60 councillors meet in the oak panelled council chamber,led by the Mayor who is dressed in a scarlet robe and a gold chain.This year the Mayor is Barbara Langstone and she lives at 42 Ridgeview Road, Whetstone N20 OHJ. The Town Clerk also has his office here.He is the chief administrative officer of the Borough.His name is Mr.E.Bennett.
